Package it.polimi.ingsw.ps03.effects

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EarnImmediateEffect
    this class represents the immediate effect Earn, that gives resources relying on the number of card of a specific color or the number of military points
    Effect
    This class is the abstract class extended by all the other Effect class
    GiveResourcesImmediateEffect
    this class represents the immediate Effect that gives some resources to the player
    HarvestingOrProduction  
    HarvestingOrProductionImmediateEffect
    this class describes the immediate effect that activates the harvesting or the market room in the billboard of a player
    PlaceImmediateEffect
    this class describes the effect Place, that allies the player to take a second card to a tower room with a possible discount
